00026 #include "OgreMemoryManager.h"
00027 
00028 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 // Allow the use of the real *alloc/free/new/delete functions
00030 #include "OgreNoMemoryMacros.h"
00031 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00035     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036     MemoryManager MemoryManager::sMemManager;
00037     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 
00039     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040     MemoryManager::MemoryManager()
00041     {        
00042     }
00043 
00044     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045     MemoryManager::~MemoryManager()
00046     {                
00047     }
00048 
00049     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050     void * MemoryManager::allocMem( const char *szFile, size_t uLine, size_t count )
00051     {
00052         void *ptr = malloc( count );
00053         return ptr;
00054     }        
00055 
00056     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057     void * MemoryManager::rllocMem( 
00058         const char *szFile, size_t uLine, void *ptr , size_t count )
00059     {
00060         void *nptr = realloc( ptr, count );
00061         return nptr;
00062     }
00063 
00064     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065     void * MemoryManager::cllocMem( 
00066         const char *szFile, size_t uLine, size_t num, size_t size )
00067     {
00068         void *ptr = malloc( num * size );
00069 
00070         if( ptr )
00071         {
00072             memset( ptr , 0, num * size );
00073         }
00074         return ptr;
00075     }
00076 
00077     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078     void MemoryManager::dllocMem( const char *szFile, size_t uLine, void *ptr )
00079     {
00080         free( ptr );
00081     }
00082 
00083 }
